SDG_TARGET:
7.1

By 2030, ensure universal access to affordable, reliable and modern energy services
SDG_INDICATOR:
7.1.1

Proportion of population with access to electricity
STAT_CONC_DEF:
Definition

It is the number of households who use electricity as their main source for lighting to the total number of households expressed as a percentage.
REC_USE_LIM: EICV considers only grid connected households using electricity as their main source of home lighting (National connection grid and local mini grid are combined together). Off grid sources like solar panel, generator and rechargeable batteries are reported separately.
DATA_COMP:
The indicator is computed as;

Pe / Pt

Where Pe denotes the number of households who declared using electricity as their main source for lighting and Pt denotes the total number of urban households.
COVERAGE:
Earliest available data

2000

Geographical coverage

National

Disaggregation

Geographical: National, Province, District & Residence (Urban & Rural)
indicator_name: Proportion of population with access to electricity
graph_title: Proportion of population with access to electricity
